item.title: [PI] adding chest that gives exp if you have amount of tickets
item.dc:creator: @F2P_Beta F2P Beta
item.description:
@F2P_Beta wrote:

ok i just a small help here, iv got most if down, im making a chest for agility, if you got 100 agility tickets you can open chest for experience in agility, this is what i have so far.

[code]case 3377:
if(!c.getItems().playerHasItem(2996, 100)) {
c.sendMessage(“You do not have 100 Agility Arena Tickets to get EXP.”);
c.sendMessage(“Complete the full agility course to get tickets.”);
break;
} else {
c.getItems().deleteItem(2996, c.getItems().getItemSlot(2996), 100);
c.getItems().addItem(c.getPA().randomChestRewards(), 1);

	}[/code]

i know what line i have to change, its…

how would i change that so it gives exp in agility? thanks guys.

Read full topic
